name: KORALLE
notes:
This dinghy had a unique feature of twin (side by side) daggerboards or centerboards.The first version of plywood construction (S6). vertically retractable lee boards. 
Somewhat later, a FG version (S6R) with folding/pivoting lee boards.
Cat rig, (mast in forward position) SA=8.5m2/91 sq.ft.
